content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":41851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Senna.\""},{"lineNumber":41852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「〜〜〜〜っ、はあぁぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":41853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええいくそ。さっさと進むぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it. Let's move quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":41854,"originalJapaneseLine":"（脱出方法が、ない……","translatedEnglishLine":"(There's no way to escape..."},{"lineNumber":41855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いざとなったら、使うしかないですね……","translatedEnglishLine":" If it comes down to it, we'll have no choice but to use it..."},{"lineNumber":41856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの、約束……）","translatedEnglishLine":" That promise...)"},{"lineNumber":41857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":41858,"originalJapaneseLine":"緩やかに蠢く肉の洞窟を、一行は歩き続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"The group continued walking through the slowly writhing flesh cave."},{"lineNumber":41859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ、ふぅ……ふぅ、は、ぁっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa, huu... huu, haah...\""},{"lineNumber":41860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ、ふ……んしょ、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn, fu... nsho...\""},{"lineNumber":41861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":41862,"originalJapaneseLine":"徐々に口数が減っていき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Gradually, their words diminished,"},{"lineNumber":41863,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつの間にか誰もが言葉を発しなくなっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and before they knew it, no one was speaking."},{"lineNumber":41864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おい、暗いぞ。何か喋れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, it's so quiet. Say something.\""},{"lineNumber":41865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええと……そう、ですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well... yes..."},{"lineNumber":41866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、ランス様。何か食べられますか？","translatedEnglishLine":" Ah, Lord Rance. Can you eat something?"},{"lineNumber":41867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確か、たこみかんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":" I think there were takomikans...\""},{"lineNumber":41868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……まあいいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... well, that should be fine."},{"lineNumber":41869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい加減、腹もこなれてきたしな。よこせ」","translatedEnglishLine":" My stomach is starting to settle anyway. Hand it over.\""},{"lineNumber":41870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ。ええと…………あっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! Uh... ah!\""},{"lineNumber":41871,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポシェットの中をがさごそと探ったシィルが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel rummaged noisily inside her pouch,"},{"lineNumber":41872,"originalJapaneseLine":"驚いたように声を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and raised her voice in surprise."},{"lineNumber":41873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":41874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……溶けちゃってます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's melted...\""},{"lineNumber":41875,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポシェットから抜いたシィルの手は、","translatedEnglishLine":"In Seel's hand, pulled out of the pouch,"},{"lineNumber":41876,"originalJapaneseLine":"でろりとした物体をまとわりつかせただけだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"was only a sticky, gooey mass."},{"lineNumber":41877,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………もしかして、他のメシもか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Could it be the other food too?\""},{"lineNumber":41878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………そ、そうみたいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... y-yes, it seems so...\""},{"lineNumber":41879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、大食い野郎が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That gluttonous bastard...\""},{"lineNumber":41880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーーーごめん、もうだめ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahhhh, sorry, I can't anymore...!\""},{"lineNumber":41881,"originalJapaneseLine":"とうとう、かなみが音を上げてその場に座り込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, Kanami gave up and sat down on the spot."},{"lineNumber":41882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらかなみ。だらしないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey Kanami. That's lazy.\""},{"lineNumber":41883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-because..."},{"lineNumber":41884,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どれだけ歩いても何もないんだもん」","translatedEnglishLine":" No matter how much we walk, there's nothing.\""},{"lineNumber":41885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう……ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's... true."},{"lineNumber":41886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんなさい、ランス兄様……少し、休憩を……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Sorry, Brother Rance... let's take a little break...\""},{"lineNumber":41887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……頑張り屋さんの香ちゃんまで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... even hardworking Ka-chan"},{"lineNumber":41888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな事を言うとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":" is saying something like that...\""},{"lineNumber":41889,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみが座ると、なし崩しに何人も座り込み始めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Kanami sat down, others gradually also began to sit,"},{"lineNumber":41890,"originalJapaneseLine":"一行の行軍は自然と停止した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the group's march naturally came to a stop."},{"lineNumber":41891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ。一時停止か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. A temporary stop, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":41892,"originalJapaneseLine":"死霊騎士が運ぶ玉座の上で、","translatedEnglishLine":"On the throne carried by the undead knight,"},{"lineNumber":41893,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルは平然と呟いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle murmured calmly."},{"lineNumber":41894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少しお休みしましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's take a little rest."},{"lineNumber":41895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様、お茶は少し無事でしたから……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Lord Rance, the tea survived a bit...\""},{"lineNumber":41896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、まあいいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, well, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":41897,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはシィルに促されて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Encouraged by Seel, Rance"},{"lineNumber":41898,"originalJapaneseLine":"適当な場所に腰を下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"sat down at a suitable spot."},{"lineNumber":41899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん、お疲れですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone is tired, aren't they...\""},{"lineNumber":41900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はまだまだいけるぞ。……そうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm still good to go. ...That's right.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいくそ。さっさと進むぞ」
いざとなったら、使うしかないですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it comes down to it, we'll have no choice but to use it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緩やかに蠢く肉の洞窟を、一行は歩き続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group continued walking through the slowly writhing flesh cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に口数が減っていき、
いつの間にか誰もが言葉を発しなくなっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and before they knew it, no one was speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ランス様。何か食べられますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lord Rance. Can you eat something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい加減、腹もこなれてきたしな。よこせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My stomach is starting to settle anyway. Hand it over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポシェットの中をがさごそと探ったシィルが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel rummaged noisily inside her pouch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚いたように声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and raised her voice in surprise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポシェットから抜いたシィルの手は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Seel's hand, pulled out of the pouch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でろりとした物体をまとわりつかせただけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was only a sticky, gooey mass.
"...Could it be the other food too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とうとう、かなみが音を上げてその場に座り込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Kanami gave up and sat down on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれだけ歩いても何もないんだもん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how much we walk, there's nothing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごめんなさい、ランス兄様……少し、休憩を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, Brother Rance... let's take a little break..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む……頑張り屋さんの香ちゃんまで
かなみが座ると、なし崩しに何人も座り込み始めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Kanami sat down, others gradually also began to sit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行の行軍は自然と停止した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the group's march naturally came to a stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死霊騎士が運ぶ玉座の上で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the throne carried by the undead knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは平然と呟いた。
ランス様、お茶は少し無事でしたから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, the tea survived a bit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはシィルに促されて、
適当な場所に腰を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sat down at a suitable spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はまだまだいけるぞ。……そうだ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいくそ。さっさと進むぞ」
いざとなったら、使うしかないですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it comes down to it, we'll have no choice but to use it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に口数が減っていき、
いつの間にか誰もが言葉を発しなくなっていた。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ランス様。何か食べられますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lord Rance. Can you eat something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい加減、腹もこなれてきたしな。よこせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My stomach is starting to settle anyway. Hand it over."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and raised her voice in surprise.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Seel's hand, pulled out of the pouch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でろりとした物体をまとわりつかせただけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was only a sticky, gooey mass.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how much we walk, there's nothing."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, Brother Rance... let's take a little break..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む……頑張り屋さんの香ちゃんまで
かなみが座ると、なし崩しに何人も座り込み始めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Kanami sat down, others gradually also began to sit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行の行軍は自然と停止した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the group's march naturally came to a stop.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the throne carried by the undead knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは平然と呟いた。
ランス様、お茶は少し無事でしたから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, the tea survived a bit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはシィルに促されて、
適当な場所に腰を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sat down at a suitable spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はまだまだいけるぞ。……そうだ」
